title: How to Make Za'atar

steps.headline: Mix the ingredients together in a small bowl.
Store.
steps.description: For the amount left over, it can be stored in a clean and dry glass jar with an airtight lid. Kept this way, it will store for up to 3 months in the fridge.

text: Mix the ingredients together in a small bowl.  Use as required. Follow the recipe's instructions. Store. For the amount left over, it can be stored in a clean and dry glass jar with an airtight lid. Kept this way, it will store for up to 3 months in the fridge.
